thread.title: 'Queer Palme' celebrates biggest year for LGBT films in Cannes

title: 'Queer Palme' celebrates biggest year for LGBT films in Cannes
text:
'Queer Palme' celebrates biggest year for LGBT films in Cannes 9:06pm BST - 02:15
'Rafiki', 'Sorry Angel' and 'The Harvesters' are just some of the films offering more sophisticated depiction of gay life and raising profile of LGBT issues - 'Queer Palme' founder. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
